duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess and treat athletic injuries, providing immediate care and developing rehabilitation plans.
Create injury prevention programs and educate athletes on proper techniques to reduce the risk of injury.
Utilize rehabilitation techniques to aid in the recovery process and ensure safe return to activity.
Collaborate with other healthcare professionals to provide comprehensive care for athletes.
Respond to medical emergencies on the field and provide appropriate care and support.
Document injury assessments, treatment plans, and progress to maintain accurate records.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Athletic Training or related field, Certification from the Board of Certification for the Athletic Trainer (BOC)
